text: Willie R. Evans (December 1, 1937 - January 4, 2017) was an American football player. He was the running back for the University at Buffalo football team in the late 1950s. He was born in Buffalo, New York. After his football career, Evans taught in Buffalo area schools for more than 30 years. Evans died on January 4, 2017 in Buffalo, New York, aged 79. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Buffalo, New York
title: Willie Evans
